name: Peepuff
description: A small, melancholy mushroom monster that releases spores when sad. Despite its gloomy demeanor, it's incredibly resilient and can drain the life force from opponents.

ability.name: Spore Cloud
ability.description: When HP drops below 50%, releases spores that have 30% chance to inflict sleep or poison on attackers.

moves.name: Spore
moves.description: Releases spores that put the target to sleep.

moves.name: Drain Kiss
moves.description: Drains the target's energy. Heals the user for 75% of damage dealt.

moves.name: Vine Whip
moves.description: Strikes the target with slender vines. Heals the user slightly.

moves.name: Petal Blizzard
moves.description: Releases a storm of toxic petals that may poison all enemies.
